title: StreamingStar Video Capture v1.01+Serial-TeamGBZ
description:
Streamingstar Video Capture is the easiest desktop video and audio recorder for Windows. The program can capture full screen and can record your audio as well as any movement happened on your screen, including software operating introduction, web teaching courses, online TV, streaming movies, FLASH/WMV/AVI animation, PPT, camera video and even chat videos and game video clips.

The audio recorded will 100% well fit with the image and actions you capture on screen, ensuring perfect how-to-video presentation and highest video and sound record are to be saved into MP4 video that a format is not too big.

Many other Video capture tools only allow user to record within the limits, while Streamingstar Video Capture's recording region is not limited which could reach full screen. Considering a better user experience, customizing the capturing region is available by Streamingstar Video Capture. Further, by taking the advanced digital video image and voice processing technique, the software avoids poor video quality and desynchronized sound.

In terms of audio, video and frame quality, the application provides a wide range to select. And itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s possible for you to save silent video if it is needed.

Streamingstar Video Capture is simple to use and powerful to create professional quality screen recording videos which is a preferred program.
